required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Nitric Oxide Lung Diffusing Capacity in Healthy, Non-smoking Adults
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of Two Commercially Available Devices to Measure Nitric Oxide Lung Diffusing Capacity in Healthy, Non-smoking Adults

brief_summary.textblock:
The measurement of nitric oxide lung diffusing capacity (DLNO) has been recently standardised. To date, two pulmonary function devices are commercially available and are used for the measurement of DLNO. No previous study assessed differences in gas exchange outcomes (e.g., DLNO values) between both devices.
The aim of this project is to compare two commercially available devices that measure lung diffusing capacity for nitric oxide (DLNO).
1. "MasterScreenTM" (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany
2. "HypAir" ("HA", Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

detailed_description.textblock:
In a single-center, crossover study conducted at the University Hospital Zurich, Switzerland, 35 healthy, non-smoking adults (>=18 years) will be invited to perform DLNO measurements in random order using the MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium) devices during one study visit.
The order of the tests on the MasterscreenTM and HypAir devices will be randomly allocated using central randomisation.

primary_outcome.measure: Difference in nitric oxide lung diffusing capacity (mL/min/mmHg)
primary_outcome.description: Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in carbon monoxide lung diffusing capacity (mL/min/mmHg)
secondary_outcome.description: Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).
Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).
Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).
Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in inspired concentrations for nitric oxide (in %)
secondary_outcome.description: Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in expired concentrations for nitric oxide (in %)
secondary_outcome.description: Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in inspired concentrations for carbon monoxide (in %)
secondary_outcome.description: Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in expired concentrations for carbon monoxide (in %)
secondary_outcome.description: Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in inspired concentrations for helium (%)
secondary_outcome.description: Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in expired concentrations for helium (%)
secondary_outcome.description: Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

secondary_outcome.description: Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in expired concentrations for oxygen (%)
secondary_outcome.description: Single-breath measurements with MasterScreenTM (PFT Pro, Jaeger, CareFusion, Hoechberg, Germany) and HypAir (Medisoft, Dinant, Belgium).

arm_group.description: Participants perform single-breath lung diffusing capacity measurements in random order during one study visit.

intervention.description: Single-breath nitric oxide lung diffusing capacity
Single-breath nitric oxide lung diffusing capacity

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age 18 years and older
Exclusion Criteria:
- Previous thoracic surgery
- Smoking
- Chronic lung disease (e.g., asthma bronchiale, COPD)
- Forced expiratory volume in 1s and/or forced vital capacity below the lower limit of normal based on spirometry [Quanjer et al. Eur Respir J 2005]
- Current respiratory infection

facility.name: University of Zurich and University Hospital of Zurich
